def_cn: 习惯法;不成文法;判例法
def_en: Common law is the system of law which is based on judges' decisions and on custom rather than on written laws.

def_cn: (未履行正式结婚手续)属于事实婚姻的
def_en: A common law relationship is regarded as a marriage because it has lasted a long time, although no official marriage contract has been signed.
